lexUnit.name: flout.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: openly disregard (a rule, law, or convention)

sentence.text: Just for once , the headstrong Duchess who had so often flouted royal convention was asking for help and guidance .
Ackerley flouted convention both in and out of the office .
